title: Possible typo in the loading screen lore. Is this the right place to post it?
body: It says distrct. Should it be district?

replies.body: This will be fixed for next patch!
same with the summoner spells on bot games smite and cleanse?

its fine
just like bloothirster :)
(that's how I remember the tip spelling it)

It's not a typo though.  It brought up Essence Reaver because generally you built it on characters that were thirsty for mana.  Bloo = blue which = the color of mana.  It's a cute Easter Egg they added to the search feature, and eventually made a tip about.
